subject: English
goals: Understand the basic components of literary analysis, including theme, character, setting, and plot.
milestones: By the end of the week, students should be able to identify and explain the elements of a literary work such as theme and setting.

learning_tasks.task: Introduction to Literary Elements: Read a basic guide on literary elements.
Examine a short story: Identify its theme, characters, setting, and plot.

practice_tasks.task: Write a brief paragraph analyzing the theme and setting of the chosen short story.

resources: Use online resources such as SparkNotes for guides on literary elements. Read 'The Lottery' by Shirley Jackson or use a short story provided by your textbook.
